document.full_text: pope john paul's coffin was exhumed on friday ahead of his beatification as tens of thousands of people began arriving in rome for one of the biggest events since his funeral in 2005.
document.title: pope john paul body exhumed ahead of beatification
lines_and_colors: pope john paul's coffin was exhumed on friday ahead of his beatification as tens of thousands of people began arriving in rome for one of the biggest events since his funeral in 2005.
